I really hate all these School stuff

Dec 26, 2025 • the42game

Mumbles…

Thinking about buying a SECOND Intel Arc B580.

For no reason, just being a Arc fan-human-ish-young-pal.

I was thinking about buying a Arc B380 if it exist, with at least 6GB of VRAM ofc, but that’s impossible with the current DRAM market that has been exploited by those AI-bubble-blowing rich capitalists who holds a tons of AI-related corpos’ stock, yes I am talking about Nvidia and Micron, oh fuck you Micron I loved you so much, Crucial used to be my only NAND Flash/DRAM choice, till I swapped to KIOXIA for NANDs.

And btw,

Fuck you Nvidia.

Anyway, back on topic about Arc B580s and B380s in fantasies…

I was thinking about buying one for gaming purposes, light gaming you know, RPGs, Racers, VNs, whatever, Minecrafts… and since I am not a huge fan of the Ray-Tracing effects(Like I can see the difference, but thats fine for someone who grew up with Nintendo Wii), I just want something a bit more powerful than my AMD/ATI RX6400 (You shouldn’t buy it, I will talk about it later on this blog, stay tune).

Speaking of which, that was me fell under Mandela-effect thinking Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3 RELOAD was release on OG Nintendo Switch as well, and I have a Switch lite so why not buy it and revisit that, but unfortunately the only thing on that OG Switch was SMT:P3P… which sucks, but let’s get’em bonus: it’s not bad for a PSP disc title that fit in that lil disk… but why build newer ports on top of that… I played SMT:P3F on PS2 via disc btw…

And what about that flashy new Atlus game on Switch…? Nope, not even on Nintendo hardwares yet, even if it might just be on Switch 2 so… pretty hopeless, PS5 Handheld or maybe even Steam Deck 2…ish stuff might be the options later so gotta just wait, I just better be stick with PC versions for now I reckon…

It’s late at night, 0120AM in fact, for editing that fucking fake thesis… I outght just hop into bed and go grab some sleep…

See ya next post.
